```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

## Text File


```{r load file, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
raw_data <- read_table("tournamentinfo.txt",col_names="txt")
```

```{r}
table(raw_data)
```

```{r extract-names,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
names <- unlist(str_extract_all(raw_data, "[A-Z]+ [A-Z]+ ([A-Z-]+)? ([A-Z]+)?"))
```

```{r names}
names
```

```{r,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
states <- unlist(str_extract_all(raw_data, "[[:upper:]]. \\|"))
states <- str_replace_all(states, " \\|", "")
points <- as.numeric(unlist(str_extract_all(raw_data, "(\\d)\\.(\\d)")))
prerating <- unlist(str_extract_all(raw_data, "R:\\s+?(\\d)+"))
prerating <- str_replace_all(prerating, "R:\\s+", "")
prerating <- as.numeric(prerating)
points
```
